content.question: Toward the middle of the second paragraph, the author uses the phrase “hawk-like features” in order to

choices.label: emphasize the ambitious character that he imagined emigrants possessed
describe the physical characteristics of the emigrants he met aboard ship
defend his view that emigrants are unusually courageous
contrast older emigrants with the younger ones he encountered

content.answer: emphasize the ambitious character that he imagined emigrants possessed

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
